I loved this movie so decided to fix all the little problems with the original pmcg.

01 - Audio was out of sync by 250ms fixed using virtualdub.

02 - Subs from http://subscene.com/ thanks to inescapabledoo for fixing bad grammar and adding the historical data text to beginning and end of subs.
